subject: Fish and Other Marine Life
Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: Some considered it a sign of trouble when the most experienced fisherman in the party began vomiting overboard as the boat lurched through 8-foot swells off the coast of Venezuela.
snippet: Some considered it a sign of trouble when the most experienced fisherman in the party began vomiting overboard as the boat lurched through 8-foot swells off the coast of Venezuela.
